channel.title: Infernal PK 317
channel.description:
[center]Apparently my server doesn't work on the server top list.. not sure why, it just never goes through, so i'm stuck posting my server here, 100% credit goes to play boy for my source. Also add my Skype name: 'Clarkniss' for update info and just to chat[/center]
[CENTER]Welcome to Infernal PK[/CENTER] [CENTER]I'm not sure how to make threads look awesome, but I'll try my best.[/CENTER]
[CENTER]Features:
*Amazing Combat *Full Chaotic + PvP Armor Degrading *Fullscreen *All Nex Armours With Effect *Curses 100% *Quick Prayers *Skillng Zone *New Runescape Hitsplats *All Dupes Fixed *Many Pk Locations *All Skills Functioning *Dragon Claws 100% *Fast Fluid Client *Perfect Eco *Amazing Stability *Perfect Switching *New Runescape Cursors *Amazing Graphics *Xp Counter *Fun Minigames *Unique Content *Full Member System *Unique Clan Chat System *Many Trainning Locations *A Lot Of Bosses *Fun Killstreak System *Symbol Support *Dicing *Frost Dragons - System *Revenant Cave *Autocasting *100% Credit to Play Boy for the source
Download the Desktop Client here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/c4nsuhml412h40k/InfernalPk%20Client%20%2B%20Cache.zip
And visit our forums: Www.tuhcowrsps.webs.com
*Videos coming soon*[/CENTER]
[center][url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s13.postimg.org/jrmp5iy3r/pk_teles.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/app.php]screen shot capture[/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s14.postimg.org/6yjfdzgbl/curses.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s10.postimg.org/3wsmyawbd/slayer.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/]image hosting 10mb limit[/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s23.postimg.org/piar4ne8b/teleports.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/]upload[/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s21.postimg.org/94h5xxmhz/pkpshop.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/]jpg images[/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s23.postimg.org/if3c8epqj/hr_Hf_L5z.gif[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/app.php]grab screenshot[/url][/center]

was I supposed to? I like it how it is. the only problem I saw with it was the thieving stalls, and I fixed that.
